title: Trump Ban on Wind Energy Projects Ruled Illegal by US Judge
description: Less than a year after President Donald Trump banned new wind projects, a federal judge ruled the president’s executive order was illegal.
content: Less than a year after President Donald Trump banned new wind projects, a federal judge ruled the president’s executive order was illegal.
